channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Destination X
channel.desc: The players are in at the deep end when they arrive at a German airport, where nothing is as it seems. So while the players are eyeing up the competition, are they missing out on valuable clues that could help them later on in the game?

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Destination X
channel.desc: The mystery tour reaches new heights, and tensions are high, as the passengers look for clues to the location of Destination X.
